item.title: Steve the Reminder Bot
item.description: Need a solution for creating a quick telegram notification bot and don’t want to have to host one?

item.title: Projects
item.description: Project Management, Software/Web Development # IS Project Experience (FYP) Jan 2024 - May 2024 Solution Architect, Full Stack Developer • Collaborated with team of 6 to create a volunteer management system for Serving in Mission (SIM Singapore), which allows project coordinators to manage volunteers and coordinate projects.
